short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access the professor's RateMyProfessor page from the Schedule of Classes page with just a few clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Highlight the professor's entire name or triple click to highlight
2) Right click on the name
3) Click on "UCI Professor Ratings"

If prompted:
4) Enter or copy & paste the department name from the choices
5) Click "OK"
